description.value:
You can more easily load weapons that use ammunition.

  • When you attack with a weapon that has the &reference[Loading] property, you can load it as part of the attack action without using a bonus action.

  • You can load a one-handed &reference[ammunition] weapon (@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.95GGJe2TrPOBeRIU]{hand crossbows}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.O7abmlrF4raTjnkr]{pistols}, and @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.Ev7JyidZMB8BA9Cn]{slings}) using a hand holding a shield or another one-handed ammunition weapon (allowing you to dual wield some ranged weapons).
